POTATOES
MAYONNAISE ---- (SOYBEAN OIL, WATER, EGG YOLKS, VINEGAR, SALT)
SUGAR
CELERY
WATER
SWEET PICKLE RELISH ---- (CUCUMBERS, SUGAR, DISTILLED VINEGAR, SALT, CONTAINS LESS THAN 2% OF: MUSTARD SEED, XANTHAN GUM, CALCIUM CHLORIDE, CELERY SEED, DEHYDRATED RED BELL PEPPER, NATURAL FLAVORING, TURMERIC, MINCED ONION)
MUSTARD ---- (WATER, VINEGAR, MUSTARD SEED, SALT, SUGAR, TURMERIC AND PAPRIKA, GARLIC POWDER, SPICES, XANTHAN GUM, ANNATTO COLOR, NATURAL FLAVOR, CITRIC ACID)
ONION
VINEGAR
RED BELL PEPPER
SALT
MODIFIED CORN STARCH
BLACK PEPPER
SODIUM BENZOATE
POTASSIUM SORBATE
XANTHAN GUM
